name: ContentsOnly: tabelog
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

@-moz-document domain("tabelog.com") {

#headline-wrap,
#rstdx-header,
#footer,
#column-side,
#rstdtl-navi,
iframe,
.contents-up,
#area_targeting_space,
#areamatch-box,
#title-feature,
#contents-feature,
.link-action-box,
#title-gourmet,
#contents-areapr,
#title-books,
#contents-books,
.relation-box,
#rstdtl-navi2,
.page-up,
#rstdata-edit,
.for-rstmaster,
#notice-rstdata,
.btn-mini-entry,
.btn-mini-edit,
.link-printer,
#blogparts,
.contents-notice,
#rdhead-entry,
#rentry-twitter,
#rentry-mobile,
#rentry-memo,
.notice,
.review-footer,
.review-info,
.review-bottom,
#rstlist-tab-up,
.com-write,
.other-review-wrap,
#rstlist-tab-down
{ display: none !important; }

li.floatclear,
#rstdx-search-navi-wrap,
#breadcrumb-wrap,
.map-morelinks,
#rstdtl-barcode,
.more-wrap
{ display: none !important; }

body,
#container,
#rstdtl-head,
#column-main,
.box-contents,
.rst-data,
.rst-info,
#rstdtl-barcode,
.review-wrap
{
    width: auto !important;
    background: #ffffff !important;
    border: none !important;
    overflow: visible !important;
    float: none !important;
}

#title-photo,
#title-review,
#title-rstdata,
.review-header
{
    width: auto !important;
    color: #444444 !important;
    background: #ffff88 !important;
    border: none !important;
    overflow: visible !important;
    float: none !important;
}

}
